p: Despite all these aforementioned uses of this plant, especially its anti-fertility effects, there is still insufficient data regarding its toxicological effects on vital organs of the body. Therefore, toxicity screening of the root extract of A. africanus is of utmost importance ( Lipnick et al., 1995). The aim of this study is to determine the acute toxicity of methanolic extract of A. africanus (MEAA) on selected organs, via blood chemistry and histopathological analysis using female Sprague-Dawley rats.
